name: Hand Dynamometer
descr:
The standard in grip force measurement for more than 30 years. An exclusive shock resistant rubber cap protects the stainless steel gauge. Wrist strap helps prevent accidental damage from dropping.

High quality, die-cast aluminum five position handle easily adjusts to different grip spans ranging from 4 cm. - 9 cm.

Measures Isometric grip force from 0-200 lbs. Includes instructions, norms, a storage/carry case and two-year warranty.
